pr_title: Fix problem with creating a group union

timeline.bodyText: This will affect all (de)serialization of the Group object. It you make it utils method, we can have this change as a quick fix in the nearest release. Otherwise it must me updated on other places too and we must notify other parties before deployment.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Fix problem with creating a group union

 - there was a problem when two groups (for example 'A' and 'AB' was
   incorrectly checked as predecessors. Only prefix of groups should be
   test there
 - for this reason, we need to set result group as the full prefix using
   ':' character on it's name end

Fix problem with creating a group union

 - there was a problem when two groups (for example 'A' and 'AB' was
   incorrectly checked as predecessors. Only prefix of groups should be
   test there
 - for this reason, we need to set result group as the full prefix using
   ':' character on it's name end
